text:
[Verse]
Golden sun goes down
Colors paint the sky
Shadows fade away
Night begins to fly

[Verse 2]
Stars begin to glow
Moonlight fills the air
City comes alive
Magic everywhere

[Chorus]
Dancing through the night
Hearts are feeling light
Dreams begin to soar
Wanting more and more

[Verse 3]
Whispers in the dark
Secrets start to flow
Music in our veins
Feel the rhythm go

[Chorus]
Dancing through the night
Hearts are feeling light
Dreams begin to soar
Wanting more and more

[Bridge]
Hold on to this time
Hold on to the shine
Let the music guide
Let’s not hide
title: Sunset Dreams
